# com.apple.developer.exposure-notification

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may use exposure notification.

## Discussion

Before you can develop an app that uses exposure notifications, you need this entitlement.  For more information on this entitlement, see [https://developer.apple.com/contact/request/download/Exposure_Notification_Addendum.pdf]. To get permission to use this entitlement, see [https://developer.apple.com/contact/request/exposure-notification-entitlement].
title: com.apple.developer.exposure-notification
